    Note

    The best possible score is 1.0 and it can be negative (because the model can be arbitrarily worse). A constant model that always predicts the expected value of y, disregarding the input features, would get a R^2 score of 0.0.

    Predictor template

    You can generate a template to use it with HandyML Predictor. By clicking on the button below, a template will be generated containing all needed information to use this trained model on new data. Then, fill it with the path of the new data on which you want to make predictions.
